On Wed, Sep 01, 2004 at 05:31:22PM -0400, Tom Emerson wrote:
> 
> No, there isn't. Scan through the mailing list archives for the
> subject "recraw" [sic].

Responding back to Kristinn's comment request, I want to be as polite as
nice to my bandwidth as possible.  Being polite to crawled web sites is 
a nice thing that goes along with it though.

My project is linguistics based.  I'm downloading from several different 
sites (some newspaper, some personal, some informal organizations) and 
analyzing sentence structure and word choice.  Analysis between the 
three isn't really what I'm looking at.  Rather, I'm looking at how 
these factors change over time on the same sites.

As a result, it's necessarily a longer term project and I'd prefer to 
not have my DSL pegged out for the next 3 years or so.  8)

Out of curiousity, has this been picked up since going 1.0?

-Phil/CERisE
